synthesis_analysis: The system excels at validating core emotional fears and reframing challenges with actionable, strength-based advice. Its primary weakness is inconsistently addressing physical anxiety symptoms and proactively exploring the root of catastrophic beliefs. To improve, it must immediately pair cognitive reframes with physical regulation techniques (e.g., breathwork) for expressed symptoms. The highest priority is evolving to preemptively tackle both the cognitive and physiological dimensions of anxiety as they arise.
